full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BYANG CHUB LAM GYI RIM PA'I SNYING PO BSDUS PA DNGOS GRUB KUN 'BYUNG BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @018A *, ,CES BYANG CHUB LAM GYI RIM PA'I SNYING PO BSDUS PA DNGOS GRUB KUN 'BYUNG ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, SNGA MO NAS DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN MANG POS BSKUL MA YANG YANG @018B BYUNG ZHING, NYE CHAR 'JAM MGON BSTAN PA'I SNYING PO LA MI PHYED PA'I DAD PA CAN LHA LCAM RIN CHEN SKYID 'DZOM GYIS BYANG CHUB LAM GYI RIM PA'I KHRID MDOR BSDUS SNYING POR DRIL BA RGYUN DU BSKYANG CHOG PA ZHIG DGOS ZHES NAN GYIS BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, BLA MA DAM RNAMS KYI ZHABS RDUL SPYI BO'I RGYAN DU 'DZIN PA DGE SLONG YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN GYIS, YUL SKYID GRONG GI NAGS KHROD BKRA SHIS BSAM GTAN GLING DU SBYAR BA'O, ,'DIS KYANG THUB PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE PHYOGS KUN TU 'PHEL ZHING RGYAS PAR GYUR CIG ,
